descriptionHtml:
Good day modders!! 

Here we have a knapsack with some little goodies for your new game, the knapsack is placed in Helgen Keep so you will encounter it pretty early on to help you on your quest to greatness. The knapsack is placed pretty much next to the fallen soldier when you first enter the 

The base armor and weapons have been altered slightly

Included in the knapsack is as follows;

Jewelery

Necklace: 1000 Points Magicka
Ring: 1000 Points Health

Armor

Stalhrim Armor: 100% Magic Resistance & 200% Health Regeneration
Stalhrim Boots: 100% Muffle & 1000 Points Carry Weight (Plenty for when your starting off and you have to keep dropping items till you can buy your first house)
Stalhrim Gauntlets: 200% Better Archery, 200% Better Lockpicking & 200% One Handed
Stalhrim Helmet: 200% Better Speech, 350% Smithing & 350 Points Stamina

Weapons

2 x Stalhrim Battle Axes (Converted into One Handed Weapons) Both with 200 Points Fire, Frost & Shock Damage
1 x Stalhrim Bow: 200 Points Fire, Frost & Shock Damage (w/ 100 Stalhrim Arrows)

15000 Gold
author: Jonny
